channel.title: How to run a Client on Windows 7 64-bit (x86)
channel.description:
Insert the .bat into your folder before the whole source with the millions of classes, edit it, and replace the thing after cd on the cmd. It will run a client on 64-bit (x86) versions of Windows 7.
Pictures :)
1 Create a New Text Document NO PIC NEEDED
2 Copy And Paste the Code into the notepad. you may remove the Echos if you want :) [code] @Echo off title Master Pk Planet (x86) Client echo --------------------------------------------------------------------- echo Master Pk Planet by Redcrownx echo Visit my site at visualbasicsources.freeforums.org. echo Enjoy Playing Master Pk Planet! echo You may Now Close this Window. echo --------------------------------------------------------------------- Cd "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit [/code]
[img]http://www.innovatorsworldwide.com/ihosting/images/tmp94f6tmp.png[/img]
3 GIF to show what to do next
[img]http://www.innovatorsworldwide.com/ihosting/images/capture21.gif[/img]
4. Save it as a .cmd or .bat
SELF EXPLANABLE
I Would like this to be a Stickie for people to know how to fix it.

item.title: How to run a Client on Windows 7 64-bit (x86)
item.dc:creator: @mattredcrown mattredcrown
item.description:
@mattredcrown wrote:

Insert the .bat into your folder before the whole source with the millions of classes, edit it, and replace the thing after cd on the cmd. It will run a client on 64-bit (x86) versions of Windows 7.

Pictures

1 Create a New Text Document NO PIC NEEDED

2 Copy And Paste the Code into the notepad.
you may remove the Echos if you want 

@Echo off
title Master Pk Planet (x86) Client
echo ---------------------------------------------------------------------
echo Master Pk Planet by Redcrownx
echo Visit my site at visualbasicsources.freeforums.org.
echo Enjoy Playing Master Pk Planet!
echo You may Now Close this Window.
echo ---------------------------------------------------------------------
Cd 
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
exit

3 GIF to show what to do next

  1. Save it as a .cmd or .bat

SELF EXPLANABLE

I Would like this to be a Stickie for people to know how to fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to run a Client on Windows 7 64-bit (x86)
